channel.title: Welcome on Mary Jonah
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome on Mary Jonah

item.title: Welcome to my Blog
item.description: Hello World, My name is Mary Jonah, from Ghana. Currently, a web developer with an Bsc in Information Technology with a dream of becoming a Data Scientist. I created this blog as I have been a beneficiary of posts from other blogs hence in the same measure I also want to give back with what I know. I hope you learn while you are here. Enjoy.
